channel.title: What's with making servers so hard? [Bet no one can solve this]
channel.description:
Alright, I am using utorrent (cause no router) And such.
I got my server on. I then used the utorrent. I have utorrent how it says in the many tutorials they shown here. I have no-ip account up and set
Firewall isn't blocking anything...
But yet, the servers wont accept my server...
What could be wrong?
~Dart Zamaki~

item.title: What's with making servers so hard? [Bet no one can solve this]
item.dc:creator: @Dart_Zamaki Dart Zamaki
item.description:
@Dart_Zamaki wrote:

Everyone is telling me differnt things!

(Maybe this is why people have so many questions here…)
To make things easier, can anyone {LIST} (give me a few links so I can compair them to hope I get this right) of tutorials on this?

Read full topic
item.source: What's with making servers so hard? [Bet no one can solve this]

item.title: What's with making servers so hard? [Bet no one can solve this]
item.dc:creator: @cdsuggestiveviolence cdsuggestiveviolence
item.description:
@cdsuggestiveviolence wrote:

If you need help port-forwarding… go to:
http://silabsoft.org

Search it up in their Wiki or on forums and im positive you will find out how to do.

Read full topic

item.title: What's with making servers so hard? [Bet no one can solve this]
item.dc:creator: @Dart_Zamaki Dart Zamaki
item.description:
@Dart_Zamaki wrote:

… I’m sorry, but not all that’s easier said than done. But seriously… How? And not MONEY wise please.

And is it a yes or no?

Read full topic
item.source: What's with making servers so hard? [Bet no one can solve this]

item.title: What's with making servers so hard? [Bet no one can solve this]
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

[quote=“Dart Zamaki, post:3, topic:236431”]So, if I had like cable, t1,t3, or dial up, I don’t need anything to port foward? So what do I need to do then?
And people will still be able to get on my server?[/quote]

Get a router and learn to portforward. Routers are only 40-100 dollars… And portforwarding is easy.

Read full topic

item.title: What's with making servers so hard? [Bet no one can solve this]
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

If you don’t have a router then you don’t even need to use utorrent. Just press run and it should go up.

Read full topic
